text:
StatsBomb | Bath, UK | Frontend Developer | Full-time | ONSITE

StatsBomb provides tools and analysis to some of the biggest clubs in world football. We're hiring a new frontend developer to work on our web-based analytics platform which tries to present actionable insights built upon hundreds of millions of events captured from football games around the globe.

We work primarily in Clojure and ClojureScript, using React and PostgreSQL, and it would be beneficial if you were football savvy and statistically literate.

Apply here: https://techspark.co/job/statsbomb-services-ltd-bath-46-soft...
